channel.title: Centric Servers New Deals
channel.description:
I’m new here I just to ask any suggestions on these servers.
Intel® Xeon® X3440 Series Cheap servers
Quadcore 2.53GHz/core 1x 4GB DDR3 ECC 500GB SATA II Bandwidth Out: 5000GB Bandwidth In: Unlimited IP Addresses: 8 IPs (5 Usable)
Intel® Xeon® E3-1280 V3
Quadcore 3.6GHz/core 1x 8GB DDR3 ECC 500GB SATA II Bandwidth Out: 5000GB Bandwidth In: Unlimited IP Addresses: 8 IPs (5 Usable)
Intel® Xeon® Dual E5-2640 Series Dedicated Servers Dual Octocore 2.5GHz/core
1x 4GB DDR3 ECC 250GB SATA Bandwidth Out: 5000GB Bandwidth In: Unlimited IP Addresses: 8 IPs (5 Usable)
I’m just wondering which one would be great.
